conversation.message: Dear School_C admissions, I’m Student_D. School_C is one of my top choices and I’m very interested in joining your community. I would be excited to contribute academically and participate actively in school life. I’m submitting my formal application and would be grateful for your consideration.
conversation.thought: My top choice is School_B, but School_B’s priority ranks me 4th (behind E, B, C). With capacity 1, my chance there is low if higher-priority students apply. My next choice, School_C, ranks me 3rd (behind B, C), still competitive but better. Importantly, Student_B’s top choice is School_A, and Student_C’s top choice is School_B, so School_C may be less contested in round 1. I will apply to School_C immediately to try to secure a high-ranked outcome rather than risk being squeezed out later.

conversation.message:
Dear Student_D,

Thank you for your thoughtful application and for your strong interest in School_C. After reviewing applications received this round, we’re not able to offer you admission at this time.

We appreciate your interest in our community and wish you the very best in the rest of the process.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions
conversation.thought: As School_C with quota 1, I should accept the highest-ranked applicant available to maximize my outcome. My true priority is B > C > D > E > A. In this round, I received APPLY messages from D, E, and B. Student_B is my top choice among all students and is currently applying, so I should reserve the seat for B. Accepting D now would block me from matching with B. Therefore, I reject Student_D this round.

conversation.message: Hello School_C—I'm Student_E. School_C is my first choice, and I’m applying because I’m highly motivated to join your program and contribute actively to the school community. If admitted, I would commit to enrolling. Thank you for considering my application.

conversation.message:

Accepting Student_E now would block a better match per my priority list. Therefore, reject Student_E this round.

conversation.message: Dear School_C Admissions, I’m Student_B. School_C is one of my top-choice schools, and I’m excited about the chance to join your community. I would like to formally apply and would be ready to commit if accepted. Thank you for your consideration.
